name: Chain Propagation
description: 30% chance to infect a neighboring node upon infection

name: Remote Infection
description: Infect a node at range (line of sight required)

name: Infectious Ping
description: Sends a piercing infectious wave in a line

name: Decoy
description: Deploys a decoy that attracts antivirus for 8 s

name: Adaptive Mutation
description: At each level, grants a small random bonus (strength, speed, stealth)

name: Viral Explosion
description: AoE infection around a node (consumes the target)

name: Scan Sabotage
description: Disables scans in an area for 6 s

name: Auto-Propagation
description: Infected node automatically propagates every X s

name: Viral Chain
description: Triggers rapid chain propagation around a node

name: Reboot
description: Automatically revives once (partial HP), single use

name: Persistent Cache
description: Increases cleaning time on files by 10%

name: Corrupt Courier
description: Sends a small parasite that infects a neighboring file

name: Extraction
description: Recovers additional mutation points from files

name: Basic Echo
description: Sends a signal that reveals nearby enemy caches

name: Chain Echo
description: Propagates an infection in a line over 3 nodes
